author: brane
msg: Ongoing work on the delta combiner (issue #531).
* compose_delta.c: (buld_range_list): Fix bug in target range generation.
Make assertion text more descriptive. Note potential optimization.
(copy_source_ops): Write off[0] instead of *off, to match off[1].
Use stricter condition to detect overlapping target copies, and make
comment about same more emphatic by changing it into an assertion.

author: gstein
msg: Some improvements to the new State mechanisms.
* svntest/wc.py:
(State.__init__): assert that the 'desc' argument is a dictionary to
make it more apparent to readers what is going on. add a comment to
clarify, too.
(State.add): add doc and an assertion for clarity.
(State.remove): enable removal of multiple paths at once.
(State.tweak): remove the filtering option (shifted to .tweak_some).
add variadic path args to enable tweaking specific paths, rather
than all items.
(State.tweak_one): removed. just use .tweak(path, key=val, key=val)
(State.tweak_some): new. tweak items selected by a filter.
* basic_tests.py:
(all functions): use .tweak() instead of .tweak_one(). use .tweak()
with multiple paths rather than a bunch of separate invocations.
(basic_switch): same as a above, plus call .remove() with multiple
paths.

author: philip
msg: * tools/dev/bash_completion (_svn): Add export command.

author: rooneg
msg: * subversion/clients/cmdline/main.c
(svn_cl__cmd_table): add 'D' to the options for 'svn export', so you can
specify a date instead of a revision.

author: rooneg
msg: correct the dizzying number of problems gstein uncovered after his review of
this file.
* subversion/libsvn_client/export.c
(copy_versioned_files): don't create a hash to pass into svn_io_get_dirents,
since it will create one for us anyway.  move declarations for a bunch of
variables into the block where they're used.  allocate a few things out
of pool, which lets us clear the subpool each time through the loop.
constify some char *'s that we were not modifying.  fix the check for an
administrative dir.
(remove_admin_dirs): as above, plus remember to destroy the subpool before
we return.
